responses.text: Very nice! Where abouts are you located?
Hmmm... I like what you're saying, but can you provide me with just a little more information? Looking for specifics.
Super! Do you offer a one-month free trial by any chance? I'm a bit tight on funds, but this is something I'd like to dip my toes in!

Alright! This looks really cool. Do you possibly have a LinkedIn or Facebook? Before doing any kind of business going forward, it'd be great to see I'm talking to a real person. Sorry! Just being cautious!

Just following upâ€” sent you a response earlier but haven't heard back yet.

Thoughts?
Very interesting... are you offering this for free? What is the pricing?
Wow! This sounds like an awesome opportunity. Can you tell me a little more about it?
Ha... too funny. I was just thinking about doing this not too long ago. I hope you haven't been reading my emails ;) In any case, what more from me do you need? Anything? Excited!
